sentences: URUGUAY said parties should recognize that emissions from agriculture might not decrease because the sector has to meet the demands of a growing population.
MALAWI urged parties to think of this issue holistically, including in relation to REDD+.
The Gambia, for the LDCs, suggested using the draft text proposed in Doha for discussions and urged, with TUVALU and TANZANIA, a focus on adaptation, not mitigation.
A contact group will be chaired by Hans Åke Nilsagard (Sweden) and Esther Magambo (Kenya).
